title: GH2022
author: GH2022
content: Hello all!I am currently undertaking a challenge for a charity called Ty Hafan https://www.tyhafan.org/ by trying to raise $100 in Bitcoin by doing tasks and performing services for people and businesses.Here's what I'm prepared to do:* Advertise/shill your business/company/social media/brand etc. on forums (I mainly frequent music and sports forums, but can do others if needed/requested to).* Write scripts for your YouTube/Rumble/BitChute videos - I have written blogs as well as scripts for the YouTube videos of friends of mine and can translate to/from English into other languages of your choice.  Any subject matter from Railway History to Cristiano Ronaldo etc. will get my full detailed attention and care.* Write website reviews of various lengths from a few lines to a few paragraphs which you can then use for your website.I won't advertise or help out anybody or any organisation involved in illegal activities; just a head's up.Please DM me if you'd be prepared to offer me a role/task and help me towards my charity goal.  All the proceeds of my challenge will be going straight to Ty Hafan once I have converted the Bitcoins to GBP £.Many Thanks
